author: Inyo Register
title: Oberlin, LA Author Publishes Children's Book
text:
(PRLeap.com) "Do You Know a Man?", a new book by Evan. Geneva J. Jackson has been released by Dorrance Publishing Co., Inc.
Inspired by the author's father, "Do You Know a Man?" tells the story of a very special man. This man was kind and strong, and he always prioritized his family. Even though this man is no longer with us, many things live on in his memory. With a mountain of wisdom only a dad could purport, "Do You Know a Man?" is sure to become a bedtime favorite for you and your children.
About the Author
Evan. Geneva J. Jackson is an Evangelist who resides in Oberlin, Louisiana. She is an active member of her community and church, where she loves to share the Word of God. Geneva and her husband, Edward, have two daughters and four grandchildren.
"Do You Know a Man" is a 30-page hardback with a retail price of $30.00 (eBook $25.00). The ISBN is 979-8-89127-514-0. Published by Dorrance Publishing Co., Inc. of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. For members of the press, to request a review copy or author interview, please visit https://bookstore.dorrancepublishing.com/pages/media-requests or to buy the book, visit our online bookstore at https://bookstore.dorrancepublishing.com/products/do-you-know-a-man GET IN TOUCH
Natasha Hlinka
Dorrance Publishing
http://www.dorrancepublishing.com
You can see the original version and more on PRLeap here: http://www.prleap.com/pr/305526/oberlin-la-author-publishes-childrens-book

author: @BFMTV
title: Yuval Raphael, survivante du 7-Octobre, représentera Israël à l'Eurovision
text:
Yuval Raphael, survivante du 7-Octobre, représentera Israël à l'Eurovision
Yuval Raphael, 24 ans, a été désignée pour représenter Israël lors de l’édition 2025 de l'Eurovision qui se déroulera à Bâle en mai prochain. Elle a survécu à l'attaque du Hamas sur le Festival Nova, au cours de laquelle au moins 370 personnes ont été tuées.
Le | Durée : 1:08

author: @ElUniversalOax
title: Registra Oaxaca más de dos mil casos de depresión en lo que va de 2023 | Oaxaca
text: Registra Oaxaca más de dos mil casos de depresión en lo que va de 2023 Los Servicios de Salud de Oaxaca tienen siete Centros Comunitarios de Salud Mental y Adicciones para brindar atención [Estatal](https://oaxaca.eluniversal.com.mx/secciones/estatal)28/12/2023 16:01 EL UNIVERSAL Oaxaca Actualizada 16:01 Oaxaca de Juárez.- De acuerdo con cifras del boletín epidemiológico del Sistema Nacional de Vigilancia Epidemiológica con corte a la semana número 49 del presente año, en Oaxaca se han registrado dos mil 147 casos de depresión. Durante la temporada decembrina, algunas personas tienden a manifestar cambios emocionales que les provoca pesimismo, impotencia y frustración; la depresión invernal pertenece a los trastornos afectivos emocionales y un dato importante para diagnosticarla es la alteración del sueño, informaron los Servicios de Salud de Oaxaca (SSO). Y es que la felicidad que debería embargar las fiestas navideñas y vísperas de Año Nuevo, para algunas personas es significado de tristeza, apatía y prefieren el aislamiento. Acuerdan ayuda humanitaria por llegada de caravana de 5 mil migrantes a Oaxaca, la más numerosa del año La dependencia señaló que durante esta época del año se incrementan los casos de depresión, ya que la mayoría hace una valoración de logros y fracasos, y en muchos casos consideran que el balance fue negativo. De acuerdo con datos de la Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS), la depresión es un trastorno mental que afecta a más de 300 millones de personas en el mundo, y es caracterizado fundamentalmente por un bajo estado de ánimo y sentimientos de tristeza prolongados, asociado a alteraciones del comportamiento, del grado de actividad y del pensamiento. La institución recomendó identificar cambios en la conducta de algún miembro de la familia o amistades como: desinterés, pesimismo, dormir demasiado y falta de ganas para salir con otras personas. De esta manera, destacó la importancia de acudir a psicoterapia para recibir atención personalizada, también cuidar la alimentación, hacer ejercicio y dormir bien. Lee más: [VIDEO. Dan golpiza a presuntos asaltantes de tienda en la colonia Los Silos, en SLP](https://sanluis.eluniversal.com.mx/metropoli/video-dan-golpiza-a-presuntos-asaltantes-de-tienda-en-la-colonia-los-silos-en-slp/) Ante ello, la dependencia destacó la importancia de reforzar la comunicación entre padres, madres, hijas e hijos y amistades. Entre las recomendaciones se encuentra el hacer pautas dentro de las jornadas laborales, fomentar el descanso mental, dormir por lo menos siete horas diarias, ello ayuda a que la mente y el cuerpo se mantengan en condiciones favorables para continuar con las actividades cotidianas. La aplicación de rutinas, ejercicios y hábitos como la actividad física, una correcta alimentación, realizar un hobby, la regulación de las horas de sueño o mantener las relaciones familiares y de amistad, son de gran ayuda para cuidar la salud mental. En caso de presentar algún episodio de depresión, las personas pueden comunicarse a la línea de la vida: 800 911 2000 para pedir apoyo o en WhatsApp Contacto Joven IMJUVE – 55 7211 2009. También pueden acudir a cualquiera de los siete Centros Comunitarios de Salud Mental y Adicciones (Uneme-Cecosama) en Oaxaca, ubicados en Santa Cruz Xoxocotlán, Trinidad de Viguera, Santo Domingo Tehuantepec, San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec, Pinotepa Nacional, Puerto Escondido y Huajuapan de León.

author: @mint
title: Haj 2024: Visit visa holders and tourists can't enter Makkah in Saudi Arabia if... | Today News
text: Hajj 2024: Saudi Arabia's government banned visit visa holders and tourists from performing the Hajj pilgrimage and entering Makkah from May 23 to June 21. To be allowed to perform the pilgrimage, a person must get a Saudi Hajj visa or obtain a Hajj permit.\"Visit visas of all types and names do not entitle their holder to perform Hajj, and instructions require obtaining a permit for that,\" Saudi Arabia's Ministry of Interior informed in a post on X.This means visit visas do not grant permission to perform Hajj. \"Temporary visas, such as student visas or Schengen visas, are not accepted,\" informed the website of Nusuk Hajj, a platform overseen by the Ministry of Hajj and Umrah.\"Visitors have been urged not to visit the city during this period [from Thursday, May 23 to Friday, June 21] or stay there without a Hajj permit during this time. Those who violate this will have strict action taken against them,\" the Khaleej Times reported.ALSO READ: First Haj flight departs from Delhi airport with 285 pilgrims onboard; all you need to knowOnly a Hajj permit allows a person to perform the Hajj in the Holy City of Makkah. During this time, any other form of visit visa is not considered a permit.Earlier, pilgrims were also advised to always carry their identification cards throughout the 'Hajj period'.ALSO READ: SpiceJet secures Haj flight rights from these seven Indian citiesWhat if the rule is violated?Saudi Arabia warned that defying Hajj regulations will result in severe and unwavering penalties.\"A fine of SR10,000 ($2,666) will be imposed on individuals caught in Makkah and the holy sites without a Haj permit, applicable to citizens, residents, and visitors,\" the ministry said in a statement posted on X earlier this week.It added, \"The fine will double for repeat offenders, and resident violators face deportation and a ban from entering Saudi Arabia,” the ministry said in the statement.

author: أرقام
title: صحيفة: ديب سيك تؤجل طرح نموذج للذكاء الاصطناعي بسبب رقائق هواوي
text:
شعار ديب سيك
أجلت الصينية "ديب سيك" إصدار أحدث نماذجها للذكاء الاصطناعي بعدما فشلت في تدريبه باستخدام رقائق "هواوي"، مما يبرز محدودية إمكانات بكين للتفوق على التكنولوجيا الأمريكية.
وذكرت مصادر على دراية بالأمر لصحيفة "فاينانشال تايمز" أن السلطات شجعت "ديب سيك" على الاعتماد على معالج "آسيند" من "هواوي" بدلاً من استخدام أنظمة "إنفيديا"، وذلك بعدما طرحت شركة الذكاء الاصطناعي نموذج "آر1" في يناير.
لكن واجهت الشركة الناشئة الصينية مشكلات فنية خلال عملية تدريب نموذج "آر2" باستخدام رقائق "هواوي"، مما دفعها للاعتماد على رقائق "إنفيديا" في عملية التدريب.
وأوضح مصدر مطلع على الأمر أن هذه المشاكل كانت السبب الرئيسي لتأجيل إطلاق "آر2" في مايو، مما تسبب في تراجع الشركة أمام المنافسين.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: Felipe Faleiro
title: Cerro Largo tem rajadas de vento de 115 km/h durante temporal
text: Cerro Largo tem rajadas de vento de 115 km/h durante temporal Prefeito Paulo Kipper afirmou que não houve desabrigados no município, um dos mais atingidos pela tormenta publicidade O prefeito de [Cerro Largo](https://www.correiodopovo.com.br/topicos/Tag/Cerro%20Largo), no Noroeste gaúcho, Paulo Kipper, disse que o município já havia passado por três situações de emergência, e agora irá para a quarta. A localidade foi uma das mais atingidas pelo temporal do começo da manhã desta sexta-feira, com [destelhamentos de residências](https://www.correiodopovo.com.br/not%C3%ADcias/cidades/forte-chuva-causa-destelhamentos-e-quedas-de-%C3%A1rvores-em-cerro-largo-1.1454499), além da derrubada da decoração natalina da Praça Central, quedas de árvores e postes. Segundo ele, choveu 54 milímetros em apenas uma hora, entre 6h e 7h de sexta, e as rajadas de vento alcançaram 115 quilômetros por hora. “Precisamos agradecer que ninguém precisou sair das casas. Dentro do possível, estamos distribuindo lonas e trabalhando desde cedo. Temos de encarar esta situação com bastante tranquilidade e paciência, que vamos conseguir nos recuperar”, afirmou ele, acrescentando que não houve desabrigados. “Ainda nem havíamos conseguir atender a todos da situação de emergência anterior, em novembro, e agora novamente isto ocorre. É mesmo um fenômeno da natureza. A RGE está com a força-tarefa nas ruas desde cedo. Dentro do possível, estamos oferecendo todo o apoio e dependemos muito do apoio da comunidade e empresários”. O temporal que atingiu o [Rio Grande do Sul](https://www.correiodopovo.com.br/topicos/Tag/Rio%20Grande%20do%20Sul) nesta sexta causou danos em diversos municípios, ocasionando [ao menos 236 mil pontos](https://www.correiodopovo.com.br/not%C3%ADcias/cidades/rs-n%C3%BAmero-de-pontos-sem-luz-sobe-para-236-mil-1.1454522) sem energia elétrica, 212 mil na área da RGE, especialmente na região metropolitana e Missões, e outros 24 mil nos locais de concessão da CEEE Equatorial, destacando regiões metropolitana e centro-sul.

author: , Reno Gazette Journal
title: Washoe County active voters drop by 6,800 in effort to clean rolls
text: The number of Democrats dropped by 270 more than Republicans in July in Washoe County. The number of Washoe County registered voters plunged by about 6,800 in July, largely due to efforts to clean up voter rolls. On July 1, Washoe County reported 330,685 active registered voters. By Aug. 1, the number had dropped 2% to 323,902, according to the Registrar of Voters’ office. This was largely attributed to 25,000 notification cards sent to registered voters whose primary ballots in June were returned as undeliverable, county elections spokesperson George Guthrie told the Reno Gazette Journal. “Our office had a lot of fresh information to act on,” Guthrie said. “The drop in active registrants is due to us taking action to inactivate those who did not follow up with us a month after we sent them a postcard.” Monday was the deadline to return those postcards. Those voters are still eligible to vote, but they will not automatically receive a mail ballot for the general election in November. They could be removed entirely if they don't vote in two consecutive general elections. "If a voter received a postcard and did not follow up with our office, we may have inactivated them," Guthrie said. "A simple phone call or visit to our office should help you get squared away for the general election," Guthrie said. "We’ll be reminding voters over the next few months to check up on their registration to make sure their voting experience in November goes as smoothly as possible." Check your voter status at washoecounty.gov/voters and click " Update My Registration ." Even if you are entirely removed from the voter rolls, Nevada has same-day registration . You must have a valid Nevada driver’s license or Nevada ID card, and you must vote in-person at a polling location. Why did voter numbers drop now? Washoe County has faced frequent criticism during public comment at commission meetings and in lawsuits from conservative groups over claims of people on the voter rolls who shouldn't be. The federal government, though, places restrictions on voter roll changes, and these sometimes keep counties from removing people even when they have good information indicating they are no longer an active voter. For example, the National Voting Rights Act doesn’t allow mass changes to voter rolls of the kind done in routine voter list maintenance 90 days before an election. Between Nevada’s June primary and the November general election, there’s a window of just a few weeks to do clean-up work. On June 26, Washoe County reported sending out more than 58,000 postcards to voters – 25,021 were for undeliverable ballots. The rest, Guthrie said, were sent to people who had some other situation that caused the county to send a notification card. These might be someone who interacted with the Nevada Department of Motor Vehicles and said they didn’t want to be registered. Or it could be someone who contacted the Registrar of Voters’ office about a change of address or just wanted to double-check their registration. “If you're getting something from our office, it's either because there was a problem with your registration,” Guthrie said, “or there was some sort of transaction that you initiated with our office that prompted that correspondence.” The county then had until Aug. 6 to make mass changes to its voter lists. It can still remove voters who have died or when an individual reports moving or asks to be removed, even during the 90-day pre-election pause. More Democrats than Republicans made inactive in Washoe County In Washoe County, active registered Democrats dropped by 1,953 in July while Republicans dropped by 1,682. The county’s largest decrease came from nonpartisans, whose active rolls went down by 2,469. As of Thursday, Washoe County shows a total of 323,369 active voters: 104,477 Republicans, 98,062 nonpartisans, 96,411 Democrats and 24,419 affiliated with minor parties. How Washoe County voter registration changes compare with the rest of Nevada Washoe County had far and away the largest decrease in the number of registered voters of any county in the state over the past month, according to data provided by the Nevada Secretary of State’s office, which oversees elections. Clark County showed nearly 16,000 more registered voters. Douglas County also saw a sizable increase – as a percentage of total active voters, it saw a jump of about 3%. Because of Clark County’s big increase, the state itself saw an overall rise of 6,005 registered voters in July. Most counties, though, saw decreases. The biggest drops as a percent of active voters came in Carson City (down 6%), Humboldt County (4.5%), and Pershing and Storey counties (2.5%). Mark Robison is the state politics reporter for the Reno Gazette Journal, with occasional forays into other topics. Email comments to [mrobison@rgj.com](mailto:mrobison@rgj.com) or comment on Mark’s Greater Reno Facebook page .

author: @infobae
title: 2-0. El Eintracht no echa de menos de Marmoush y pone rumbo a los octavos - Infobae
text:
Redacción deportes, 23 ene (EFE).- El Eintracht de Fráncfort no acusó la ausencia del delantero egipcio Omar Marmoush, que este jueves fue traspasado al Manchester City, y puso pie y medio en los octavos de final de la Liga Europa, tras imponerse este jueves por 2-0 al Ferencvaros húngaro.
Poco importó al conjunto germano, que percibirá 70 millones de euros por la venta de Marmoush, la pérdida de su mázimo goleador, ya que a falta del atacante egipcio el Eintracht parece tener asegurada la faceta anotadora con el francés Hugo Ekitike.
Y eso que el atacante galo vio como el guardameta del Ferencvaros Denes Dibusz, que minutos más tarde tuvo que abandonar el terreno de juego lesionado, le privaba del gol a los diecinueve minutos con una sensacional parada.
Pero ni así dejó de intentarlo Ekitike que a los cuatro minutos de la segunda mitad en la que el francés, tras un magnifico control, se topó con el portero Adam Varga, el sustituto del lesiona do Dibusz.
Nada pudo hacer, sin embargo, el cancerbero del Ferencvaros, en el que se estrenó en el banquillo el técnico irlandés Robbie Keane, por evitar que unos segundos después el turco Can Uzun abriese finalmente el marcador (1-0) para el Eintracht con un espectacular zapatazo desde fuera del área,
Un gol que acabó con la resistencia del conjunto magiar que en el minuto cincuenta y nueve se despidió de cualquier opción de poder dar la sorpresa, tras ver como Ekitikñe establecía el que a la postre sería el definitivo 2-0, en una acción en la que el francés fue el más vivo en el área.
Victoria que pone al Eintracht de Fráncfort, campeón del torneo en el año 2022, con pie y medio, sino con los dos, en los octavos de final a falta de una última jornada en la que los de Jan Fiesser visitarán el campo del Roma.EFE
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->media and entertainment industry

author: Lukastaec
title: 30 ideias para decorar a sua mesa de Natal
text:
Neste artigo, a Jane em Casa apresenta
30 ideias lindas para decoração de mesa e centro de mesa de Natal. As ideias incluem uma variedade de estilos, do clássico ao moderno, do simples ao luxuoso.
Aqui estão algumas das ideias mais interessantes:
Mesa de Natal preto e branco: Esta mesa elegante apresenta o branco da neve e a elegância atemporal do preto. São usadas decorações simples, como velas e plantas verdes, para criar uma atmosfera aconchegante.
Mesa de Natal natural: Esta mesa apresenta elementos naturais, como pele de veado e galhos. É uma ótima maneira de trazer um toque da natureza para as celebrações de Natal.
Mesa de Natal luxuosa: Esta mesa apresenta decorações ricas, como cristais e vidro colorido. É uma ótima maneira de criar uma atmosfera festiva deslumbrante.
Independentemente do seu estilo, você certamente encontrará uma ideia para decorar a sua mesa de Natal que irá gostar neste artigo.
Aqui estão algumas dicas adicionais para decorar a sua mesa de Natal:
Comece escolhendo um tema ou estilo. Isso ajudará a restringir suas opções e criar uma aparência coesa.
Use cores e materiais que se complementem. Por exemplo, se você estiver usando cores vivas, escolha decorações com um toque suave.
Não tenha medo de experimentar. Não há regras rígidas quando se trata de decorar a mesa de Natal. Misture e combine elementos para criar uma aparência única.
Espero que este artigo ajude você a criar uma mesa de Natal bonita e festiva.
